body:
I believe this failing test is addressed in this PR:
https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/pull/17355

> I believe this failing test is addressed in this PR:

@cbertinato : Yes, you are correct.  Please ignore this failure for your PR.
@cbertinato : This PR looks good to go, but I think we'll hold on merging until we fix the test failure.

Awesome.  Thanks for understanding.

We'll ping when it's merged so you can rebase and get all tests to pass.
if you can rebase and push again
